info.title: Your Super Application API
info.description: API Documentation for the Booking Courses application

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token
Logout user and revoke access token
Book a course for the current authenticated user

course_id.description: The ID of the course to book

message.example: No available seats for this course

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific booking

put.description: Update method is not implemented for bookings

message.example: Update method is not allowed for bookings

delete.description: Cancel an existing booking (Users can only cancel their own bookings)
